ModMetaData.name: GeneticRim Alpha Animals Patch
ModMetaData.author: Sarg
ModMetaData.description:
Extract DNA from animals and hybridize them to create new, exotic species!
<size=24>Features</size> - Adds nine hybrids between vanilla creatures and animals from the Alpha Animals mod! - Adds a new building, the Alpha genepod, to mix genes from alpha animals and create your hybrids.
<size=24>Load Order</size> - As with all patch mods, be sure to call it after Alpha Animals mod and GeneticRim mod, or else you'll get some errors.
<size=24>Compatibility</size> Compatible with A Dog Said Should be savegame compatible and not break anything. Should!
<size=24>Credit</size> Credit goes to A_friend for his work on Alpha Animals graphics.
<size=24>Changelog</size> v1.3: Updated to refelct changes in ranged system in Alpha Animals (04/02/21) v1.2: Updated for RimWorld 1.2 (11/08/20) v1.1: Updated for RimWorld 1.1 (19/02/20) v1.04: Added animal control abilities to the Animus Hare. Added nocturnal animal code to the Nighthrumbo (17/09/19) v1.03: Added the seven new animals to genetic extraction table. Changed all hybrids to use GeneticAnimal instead of ExoticAnimal so they don't appear on modded merchants (23/08/19) v1.02: Added the nine new animals to genetic extraction table. Small bugfixes (16/04/19) v1.0: Release (16/02/19)
